#summary Dependency parser: guidelines

_Clear dependency parser_ uses Choi-Nicolov's approach of Nivre's list-based dependency parsing algorithm. The parser gives options of customizing feature templates and choosing different learning algorithms. Clear dependency parser has been imported to several organizations such as CLEAR, J.D. Power & Association, Mayo Clinic. 

== Training ==

{{{
java clear.engine.DepTrain -c <configuration file> -i <train file> -m <model file> -t <feature template file>
java -Xms8g clear.engine.DepTrain -c config/en_dep_config.xml -i dat/sample.dep -m sample.mod -t config/en_dep_feature.xml
}}}

 * <*configuration file*>: name of a file specifying [ConfigGuidelines configurations] ([http://code.google.com/p/clearparser/source/browse/trunk/config/en_dep_config.xml config/en_dep_config.xml])
 * <*train file*>: name of a file containing dependency trees for training in either [DataFormat dep or conll format] ([http://code.google.com/p/clearparser/source/browse/trunk/dat/sample.dep dat/sample.dep]).
 * <*model file*>: name of a file to contain trained models.
 * <*feature template file*>: name of a file containing [FeatureGuidelines feature templates] ([http://code.google.com/p/clearparser/source/browse/trunk/config/en_dep_feature.xml config/en_dep_feature.xml]).

== Decoding ==

{{{
java clear.engine.DepPredict -c <configuration file> -m <model file> -i <input file> -o <output file>
java -Xms8g clear.engine.DepPredict -c config/en_dep_config.xml -m wsj-onto.mod -i dat/sample.dep -o dat/sample.out
}}}

 * <*configuration file*>: name of a file specifying [ConfigGuidelines configurations] ([http://code.google.com/p/clearparser/source/browse/trunk/config/en_dep_config.xml config/en_dep_config.xml])
 * <*model file*>: name of a file containing trained models.  A pre-trained model can be downloaded from [http://verbs.colorado.edu/~choijd/models/wsj-onto.mod wsj-onto.mod].  It is trained on the Wall Street Journal sections 2 - 21 in the OntoNotes Treeank, which is a subset of the entire Penn Treebank.
 * <*input file*>: name of a file containing dependency trees for decoding in either [DataFormat pos, dep or conll format].  The HEAD and DEPREL columns do not need to have values or can be filled with any values.
 * <*output file*>: name of a file containing system dependency trees in [DataFormat dep format] ([http://code.google.com/p/clearparser/source/browse/trunk/dat/sample.dep dat/sample.dep]).

== Evaluating ==

{{{
java clear.engine.DepEvaluate -g <gold-standard file> -s <system file>
java clear.engine.DepEvaluate -g dat/sample.dep -s dat/sample.out
}}}

 * <*gold-standard file*>: name of a file containing gold-standard dependency trees in [DataFormat dep conll format].
 * <*system file*>: name of a file containing system dependency trees in [DataFormat dep conll format].
